thread.title: Statoil ASA: Information relating to proposed dividend for fourth quarter 2017

author: cnbc.com
title: Statoil ASA: Information relating to proposed dividend for fourth quarter 2017
text:
Key information relating to the proposed cash dividend to be paid by Statoil (OSE:STL, NYSE:STO) for fourth quarter 2017.
1. Dividend
Proposed dividend amount: 0.23
Declared currency: USD
Last day including rights: 15 May 2018
Ex-date: 16 May 2018
Record date: 18 May 2018
Payment date: On or around 30 May 2018 at Oslo Stock Exchange (Oslo BÃ¸rs), on or around 31 May 2018 at New York Stock Exchange.
The proposed dividend amount is subject to approval by the Annual General Meeting on 15 May 2018.
Other information: Dividend per share in NOK will be communicated 24 May 2018
This information is published in accordance with the requirements of the Continuing Obligations.
This information is subject to the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5 -12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.
Source:Statoil
